overview:
Jeroen Seghers (Oostende, 19 June 1983) is a Belgian serial entrepreneur and investor based in London.

He started programming in his early teens and has since founded several companies which released various products reaching over 100 million users across the globe.

Jeroen was involved with the product development and marketing of StartNow.com, iPhox, Wyzo and a leading filesharing client.

He currently serves as CEO of Zugo Services Ltd and sits on the board of several startups around the world.

Jeroen holds a bachelor in Computer Science from Hogeschool Gent and became the youngest executive to be admitted to a Master Class at Vlerick Leuven Gent Management School.
